name: Konsui Fighter
summary:
Crash! That was last thing Professor Ayumu Tsuburaya heard before waking up in the hospital. While in a coma, he struggles to remember what led to his condition. Searching his psyche for answers, the beings that make up the fabric of his personality begin to emerge, locked in conflict.

Konsui Fighter is a hand-drawn animated fighting game. The game features 10 playable characters, online/local multiplayer, arcade mode, character tutorials, and an in-depth story mode where players can embark on Ayumu's journey and fight to regain his lost memories.

As the Tournament of the Mind begins, will Ayumu's mind regain order, or will it remain forever lost in chaos?
